resources.string: This app helps you to get Sensor values form DHT11, BME280. And you can use this application for turning "ON" And "OFF" LEDS operate home appliances you can use this app with ESP8266 and ESP32. The Basic Examples And installation are given bellow.

For Arduino IDE, download zip file from the repository (Github page) by select Code dropdown at the top of repository, select Download ZIP
From Arduino IDE, select menu Sketch -> Include Library -> Add .ZIP Library....
Choose IOT-ASSISTANT-master.zip that previously downloaded.
Rename IOT-ASSISTANT-master folder to IOT-ASSISTANT.
Go to menu Files -> Examples -> IOT-ASSISTANT and choose one from examples.
